sen.j: 承平6年（936年）伊予国日振島（ひぶりしま）の海賊が不穏な動きをしていたことから、これを封じるため、伊予守兼南海道追捕使に任じられ、瀬戸内へ下向した。
sen.e: In 936 pirates of Hiburi Island in Iyo-no-kuni were making threatening moves, and in order to contain the menace, he was appointed Governor of Hiburi and 'tsuiboshi' (a policing role) and was sent down to Setouchi.

sen.j: 淑人は前任の伊予守藤原元名の一族で現地に土着化していた藤原純友を配下に迎えて海賊に田畑を与え農業に従事させる投降策をとった。
sen.e: Yoshito welcomed under his control Fujiwara-no-Sumitomo, who was a member of the family of his predecessor Motona Fujiwara and was well settled locally, and they instigated a policy of giving the pirates fields and making them surrender and work at farming.

sen.cmt: FUJIWARA no Sumitomoに訂正しました。FUJIWARA大文字にしました。Iyo no kami (Governor of Iyo Province) 補足しました。
